mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FEED VALUES ( seq_feed.nextVal, #{user_id}, #{feed_image}, #{feed_text}, TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd am hh24:mi') )
mapper.update: UPDATE FEED SET FEED_TEXT = #{text} WHERE FEED_IDX = #{feed_idx}
mapper.select: SELECT PROFILE_IMAGE, MEMBER_ID FROM PROFILE WHERE MEMBER_ID LIKE '%'||#{user_id}||'%' AND NOT MEMBER_ID = #{my_id}
SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM FEED WHERE USER_ID = #{id}

SELECT PROFILE.PROFILE_IMAGE AS friend_profileImg, FEED.* FROM FEED, FRIENDS, PROFILE WHERE FRIENDS.MY_ID = #{my_id} AND FRIENDS.FRIEND_ID = FEED.USER_ID AND FRIENDS.FRIEND_ID = PROFILE.MEMBER_ID ORDER BY FEED.FEED_REGIDATE DESC
SELECT PROFILE.PROFILE_IMAGE AS friend_profileImg, FEED.* FROM FEED, PROFILE WHERE FEED.FEED_IDX = #{feed_idx} AND FEED.USER_ID = PROFILE.MEMBER_ID ORDER BY FEED.FEED_REGIDATE DESC
